ARABIC: يَٰعِبَادِ لَا خَوْفٌ عَلَيْكُمُ ٱلْيَوْمَ وَلَآ أَنتُمْ تَحْزَنُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: 'My slaves, you will feel no fear today; you will know no sorrow.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: O My creatures, there will be no fear or regret
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (It will be said to them): “My servants, today you have nothing to fear or regret,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: whom God will tell, "My servants, you need have no fear on this day, nor will you be grieved".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: To such will be said, “O My bondmen! This day there shall be no fear upon you, nor any grief.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: My servants! No fear shall be on you this Day, nor shall you grieve,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: O My servants! there is no fear for you this day, nor shall you grieve.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: O My servants, today no fear is on you, neither do you sorrow' --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: O My slaves! For you there is no fear this day, nor is it ye who grieve;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: O My servants, you need not fear this Day, nor shall you grieve" --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: O My bondmen! no fear shall be on you Today, nor shall ye grieve
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: [They will be told,] ‘O My servants! Today you will have no fear, nor will you grieve
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: My devotees! no fear shall be on you that Day, nor shall ye grieve,-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: (It will be said to the true believers of Islamic Monotheism): My worshippers! No fear shall be on you this Day, nor shall you grieve,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: O My worshipers, there is no fear for you on this Day, nor will you grieve
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: O My servants, you have nothing to fear on that Day, nor will you grieve.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [To whom Allah will say], "O My servants, no fear will there be concerning you this Day, nor will you grieve,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [43:68] ‘O My servants, there is no fear for you this day, nor will you grieve,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Allah will then say: (0 My slaves! For you there is no fear this day) when others are in fear, (nor is it ye who grieve) when others are in grief;
